message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is fair considering the depreciation.
I'm willing to be generous, Alice, but the split needs to reflect the rate of depreciation. This offer is my bottom line for this round.
Bob, time is money!  Let's end this. This is my final offer.
Alice, this is it.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option given the time pressure.  Take it or leave it.
